TopicTitle: Modders - I can't thank you enough for all you've done for us players in this game

Articles.Content:
Honestly, it is simply astounding how much value you add to an already fantastic game. If we could use more than 3.5 gig of RAM I'd be using ~100 mods because there are so many good ones here.

Just had to make a thank you thread for you because you''re often under-appreciated.
100% agree. I was reluctant to pick up any mods because I was afraid to "contaminate" my vanilla game, but since I started using them they've completely enriched my gameplay. Thank you so much!
